_metadata.root_name: AS GCM Clause Set - Copy Clause Set Clauses

entry_point.target_process: AS GCM Copy Clause Set Clauses

expressions.TITLE: "Copy Clause Set Clauses"
expressions.VISIBILITY:
and(
  rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_UT_isUserMemberOfGroups(
    groups: cons!AS_GCM_GRP_CONTRACTING_PERSONNEL,
    user: loggedInUser()
  ),
  rule!AS_GCM_CopyClauseSetClausesActionEnabled_wrapper() = true
)
